titleStmt.title: The peoples plea: fully vindicating the povver and proceedings of the Parliament. Occasioned by a defence of the covenant. /
titleStmt.author: Robinson, John, prebendary of Westminster.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Robert Bostock, at the Kings Head in Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: A reverend divine = John Robinson, prebendary of Westminster.
Annotation on Thomason copy: "By Dr Robinson prebend of Westminster formerly a great malignant"; "March: 13 1645"; the second 6 in imprint date crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Kings Head in Pauls Church-yard.
